field.name: DESCRIPTION
field.value: #ENTITY_ID# - Group ID #LOG_DATE# - Entry date #TITLE# - Title #MESSAGE# - Message #URL# - Address (URL) #GROUP_NAME# - Group title #SUBSCRIBER_NAME# - Subscriber's first name #SUBSCRIBER_LAST_NAME# - Subscriber's last name #SUBSCRIBER_EMAIL# - Subscriber's e-mail address #SUBSCRIBER_ID# - Subscriber ID
